{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Gargoyle fireball | class = HereticImpBall | game = Heretic | spawnid = 10 | spawnname = T_IMPFIREBALL }}[[Classes]]: HereticImpBall
The little fireball thrown by [[Classes:HereticImpLeader|fire gargoyles]]. Common [[Classes:HereticImp|gargoyles]] are unable to produce them. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR HereticImpBall { {{Property|Radius}} 8 {{Property|Height}} 8 {{Property|Speed}} 10 {{Property|FastSpeed}} 20 {{Property|Damage}} 1 {{Property|Projectile}} {{Property|SeeSound}} "himp/leaderattack" +{{Flag|SPAWNSOUNDSOURCE}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEPCROSS}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEIMPACT}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add States { Spawn: FX10 ABC 6 Bright Loop Death: FX10 DEFG 5 Bright Stop } }
